scheme_name: Financial Assistance for Treatment of Chronic Diseases (HBOCWWB)
details: The scheme “Financial Assistance for Treatment of Chronic Diseases” is implemented by the Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB), Labour Department, Government of Haryana. Under this scheme, financial assistance is provided to registered workers for indoor treatment of chronic diseases like Cancer, TB, AIDS, etc. as per government rules.
benefits: Financial assistance up to ₹1,00,000/- is provided to registered workers for indoor treatment of chronic diseases like Cancer, TB, AIDS, etc.
eligibility: The applicant should be registered under the Haryana Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board.
The registered worker must have a regular membership for one year.
The workers who are registered and require indoor treatment for chronic diseases such as cancer, tuberculosis (TB), AIDS, etc., are eligible to apply under the scheme.
The application frequency is limited to once.
application_process: Registration of a Construction Worker Under HBOCWWB:
Apply for Scheme: Registration Process on Antyodaya-SARAL Portal:
documents_required: Identity proof i.e. Aadhaar Card, Voter Card
Certificate of Medical Officer of Government or Private Empanelled hospital
Original Bill of expenditure on the treatment
